FuncDef: The display ipsec proposal command displays information about security proposals.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a security proposal.
The value is a string of 1 to 15 case-sensitive characters.Except the question mark (?) and space. However, when quotation marks (") are used around the password, spaces are allowed in the password.

Specifies to display the brief information about security proposals.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
IPsec ensures security using the security proposal. You can run the display ipsec proposal command to view the following information:
Name of the IPsec security proposalEncapsulation mode defined in the security proposalSecurity protocol defined in the security proposalAuthentication and encryption algorithms defined in the security proposal
